content.question: Which of the following statements is true about Iranian domestic policy?

choices.label: The government does not allow foreign investment.
Women are forbidden to attend university.
The government argues that environmental policies are against Shari’ah law.
The predominant interpretation of Shari’ah law allows for birth control.
The government has forbidden the production of nuclear energy.

content.answer: The predominant interpretation of Shari’ah law allows for birth control.
